summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3478 for the improvement of East 46th Street, from 22nd Avenue Northeast to a point one hundred twenty-five (125) feet east of the east line of Campus Addition to The City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43151, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
